ygData.subject: Re: Everquest Secrets?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I got a refund after purchasing this info. Here is the tip/secret... Kill lots of things, and don t die. There was no information that hasn t been
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

I got a refund after purchasing this info. Here is the tip/secret...
Kill lots of things, and don't die. There was no information that
hasn't been provided someplace else in a better format. Again, the
whole basis for any of the player/class guides was don't die because
it reduces the amount of time that you could be out killing things.
It does not tell where to hunt or at what level.

Any bugs/secrets were so old to have already been fixed by Verant.
If you are looking for any specific info on a class/race, your better
off posting the question here.

~Jim

--- In EQ-Quest@egroups.com, "Rick " <craigba@v...> wrote:
> Has anyone ever heard of this EQ Bugs/Secrets web site?
>
> http://www.eqtotalsecrets.com
>
> Please email me the password if you have it. I want all the cool
> info but I don't want to have to pay for it
>
> Thanks
